p: The GCMS analysis of essential oil was performed on the Agilent 5977A MSD and 7890B GC system, Chemetrix; Agilent Technologies, DE (Germany) with a Zibron-5MS column. GC grade helium at 2 mL/min flow rate and spitless 1 mL injection was used and temperatures were set at 280 °C (Injector), 280 °C (Source) and 70 °C (oven) while the ramp settings were set as follows and held for 3 min; 15 °C/min to 120 °C, followed by 10 °C/min to 180 °C and finally 20 °C/min to 270 °C.
